ing: 2 1/2 fluid ounces amaretto liqueur (such as DisaronnoÂ®)
2 fluid ounces energy drink (such as Monster Energy)
des: "This is a very delicious drink sort of like Long Island iced tea, but with a twist. Be careful though! As good as it tastes, you may not realize how much alcohol you are consuming."
ins: Fill a large glass with ice. Pour in the amaretto, rum, and triple sec. Stir, and pour in the cola beverage and energy drink at the same time to fill the glass.
